inventory.commentary: 30aug06 added examples, features, modified definitions, upgraded to WN 2.1. ahouston.

sense.name: principal administrative division of a country or empire
sense.commentary: PROVINCE[+location][+geographical][+territory][+division][+administrative][+principal] The territory occupied by one of the constituent administrative districts of a nation or empire
sense.examples: She grew up in a western province of Canada. He'll go to Paris after he's toured all the provinces. In ancient Rome, governors were sent to rule the provinces outside of Italy.

sense.name: scope of interest, responsibility, expertise
sense.commentary: PROVINCE[+environment][+social][+scope][+responsibility/+interest/+expertise] The proper sphere or extent of your activities, a special interest or responsibility
sense.examples: She knew little about wine, that had been her father's province. It was his province to take care of himself. That question is outside my province.
